pkgmetadata.longdescription: Registry of Victims of State Terrorism in Argentina // Compilation and digitalization of the official registry of victims of state terrorism in Argentina during the last military coup. The original data comes from RUVTE-ILID (2019) https://www.argentina.gob.ar/sitiosdememoria/ruvte/informe and http://basededatos.parquedelamemoria.org.ar/registros/. The title, presentes, comes from present in spanish.
